required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Tolerability, Efficacy, and Safety of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase IIa, Multi-center, Open-label, Non-randomized, Active-controlled, and Dose-escalation Clinical Study Evaluating Tolerability, Efficacy, and Safety of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion for Sedation/Anesthesia in Patients Undergoing Diagnostic Colonoscopy

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: A double-blind, randomized, active controlled, multi-center, parallel group study comparing HSK3486 with Propofol, in patients undergoing a colonoscopy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to removal of colonoscope on day 1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of study drug until insertion of colonoscope on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: The success rate of the colonoscopy procedure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to removal of colonoscope on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients who successfully completed the colonoscopy procedure accounted for the proportion of all patients in the dose group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the removal of colonoscopy procedure, until the first of three consecutive MOAA/S scores of 5 on day 1
From the removal of colonoscopy procedure, until the first of three consecutive MOAA/S scores of 9 on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Application of study drug and alternative medication
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the colonoscopy procedure on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Total dosages of study drug and alternative medication

secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the screening and the colonoscopy procedure on day 1

intervention.description: For induction and maintenance of sedation.
For induction and maintenance of sedation.
